## Class Objectives

1. Train environmental scientists in advance data analysis techniques

2. Teach best data practices for reproducible science and collaborative research

3. Develop data communciation skills through Shiny Apps and visualizations

4. Build data wrangling skills to tackle diverse datasets

## Topics Covered

Machine Learning

Model Building

Time Series

Spatial Data Analsyis

Text mining

Webscraping and API use
